nodes.text: Mount Vorena was a mountain that was located on the planet Volik.
Mount Vorena was the highest mountain on Volik and pockets of mumau root grew on the side of it. A river made of melting icecaps flowed down the mountain, ending in a waterfall known as Jolee Falls.

Mount Vorena was named after Vorena, the wife of the Jedi Master Dorin Se'ol. Following the death of Vorena, Se'ol climbed to the top of the mountain, to meditate. The mountain later became a site of pilgrimage for other Jedi, who would climb the peak to try and make contact with the Force ghosts of their loved ones.
